data.text:
“…I may begin to cry and cry so much that nothing and nobody can stop me.

And the tears will fill the room, I won't be able to breathe, and I will pull you down with me, and we'll both drown.

I'll lear how to swim.

I swear, I'll leam how to swim.“

"Isabel Coixet's 'The Secret Life of Words' is a poignant and deeply affecting exploration of human connection and emotional healing. With exquisite sensitivity, Coixet delves into the…

Entre traumas e silêncios a conexão se faz de pesos e contrapesos sobre a abertura de seus dramas. Abrir a caixa de Pandora do passado pode ser alívio ou aprofundamento da dor. E a palavra tem o dom. Dom de curar, de exorcizar, de abraçar, de amar.
